title.narrative: Emplement - Empowering Urban Regions For Cooperative, Synergistic And Practical Implementation Of Sustainability And Resilience Strategies Considering The Urban-Rural Nexus In Vietnam

description.narrative: The main objective of the proposed project is to support the technical capacity of the Vietnam Office of UN-Habitat to develop programmes and proposals contributing to the implementation of the New Urban Agenda and achieving SGDs. The Vietnam of will be capacitated with required expertise as required, recover cost of the office.

department.narrative: Regional Office for Asia and the Pacific

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: Improved capacity of country office of Vietnam and ROAP to develop results oriented project formulation and partnership building

title.narrative: Measured by the concept proposal and then full proposal developed in line with AF project formulation guidelines, meeting all principles of AF, timely submission and success of the concept proposal and proposal.
